error.title: Error loading jobs
error.message: There was an error fetching job listings. Please try again or contact support.

empty.title: No jobs found
empty.message: No jobs match your current filter criteria

companies.title: Companies
companies.verifyDescription: Verify that you are part of {{companyName}} to manage its profile and job listings.
companies.verifyAlert: Providing accurate information and uploading valid documents helps our team verify your company faster.
companies.emailVerified: Email verified successfully! Your account is awaiting admin approval to manage {{companyName}}.
companies.emailVerifiedSuccess: Email verified successfully! You now have access to manage {{companyName}}.
companies.documentUploaded: Document uploaded successfully! We'll review your document and verify your company ownership.
companies.documentDescription: Upload a document that proves your affiliation with {{companyName}} (PDF files only, max 5MB). Accepted documents: Company ID, Business card, Employment letter, or any official document with your name and the company name.
companies.unauthorizedUse: Unauthorized use of company details may lead to legal consequences.
companies.descriptionCheck: Please double-check all information before submitting — company details cannot be edited later.
companies.includeUrl: Include the full URL with http:// or https://
companies.descriptionLimit: If provided, description must be at least 10 characters
companies.addValuePlaceholder: Add a company value (e.g. Innovation, Integrity)
companies.pressEnter: Press Enter to add a value or click the plus button
companies.companyNotExist: The company you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

jobApplicationPage.successMessage: Your application has been successfully submitted. The company will contact you if they're interested.
jobApplicationPage.notAcceptingApplications: This job is not currently accepting applications.
jobApplicationPage.researchCompanyBeforeApplying: This company's profile has not yet been verified by Taleex. We recommend researching the company before submitting your application. If anything appears suspicious, please use the report feature to notify our team.
jobApplicationPage.jobPostedBy: This job is posted by Taleex on behalf of an external company. Please verify the company’s legitimacy before proceeding with your application.

reportJobDialog.title: Report this job listing
reportJobDialog.errorMessage: Failed to submit report. Please try again.
reportJobDialog.selectReasonError: Please select a reason for reporting
reportJobDialog.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
reportJobDialog.reasonDescription: Why are you reporting this job?
reportJobDialog.detailsPlaceholder: Please provide any additional details about this report
reportJobDialog.otherReasonMessage: Please provide details for your report
reportJobDialog.reportSuccess: Thanks for letting us know. We’ve logged your report and will follow up if further action is needed.

Report this job if it seems suspicious o: Report this job if it seems suspicious or inappropriate

fileUpload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here
fileUpload.supports: Supports PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG

applicationForm.title: Apply for this position
applicationForm.description: Fill out the form below to submit your application
applicationForm.linkedInDescription: Share your LinkedIn profile to help the employer learn more about you
applicationForm.resumeDescription: Upload your resume or CV (PDF files only)
applicationForm.consent: By submitting this application, you consent to Taleex sharing your information with the company posting this job.

applicantss.dialogDescription: Send job invitations to the selected applicants.

aboutPage.heroQuote: We're not replacing the recruiter. We're giving them superpowers.
aboutPage.heroDescription: An AI-driven platform that makes recruitment faster, smarter, and fairer for everyone.
aboutPage.whatIsTaleexDescription: An AI hiring platform that simplifies job management, screening, and communication—all in one place.
aboutPage.targetAudienceDescription: Designed for modern teams and hiring professionals.
aboutPage.featuresDescription: Unlock your recruiting potential with these intelligent tools.
aboutPage.comingSoonDescription: A glimpse of what we’re building for tomorrow’s recruiters.

businessOwners.title: Business Owners
businessOwners.description: Streamline your hiring process and find the right talent faster.

hrProfessionals.title: HR Professionals & Recruiters
hrProfessionals.description: Get AI-powered tools that enhance your expertise, not replace it.

startups.title: Growing Startups & Mid-sized Companies
startups.description: Scale your recruitment efforts without scaling your team.

companyProfile.title: Company Profile Management
companyProfile.description: Shape AI evaluation based on your company values and hiring criteria.

aiCV.title: AI CV Reviewing
aiCV.description: Goes beyond keyword-matching to analyze true relevance and culture fit.

aiInterview.title: AI-powered Interview
aiInterview.description: Real-time, adaptive interviews personalized for each role.

aiFeedback.title: AI Feedback
aiFeedback.description: Behavioral insights, technical clarity, and structured hiring feedback.

trustTransparency.title: Trust & Transparency
trustTransparency.description: Verified companies, candidate protections, and full control.

smarterCommunication.title: Smarter Communication
smarterCommunication.description: One-click rejections, follow-ups, and branded engagement emails.

talentReRouting.title: Talent Re-Routing
talentReRouting.description: Easily reassign candidates to more suitable roles.

jobApplicationManagement.title: Job Application Management
jobApplicationManagement.desc: Filter, organize, and respond to applicants effortlessly.

aiCVMatching.title: AI CV Matching & Interviews
aiCVMatching.desc: Use AI for smarter screening and personalized interviews.

candidateCommunication.title: Candidate Communication
candidateCommunication.desc: Update, reject, or engage candidates with minimal effort.

signupForm.termsText: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

forgotPassword.enterEmail: Enter your email to receive reset instructions
forgotPassword.sentTo: We've sent a password reset link to
forgotPassword.checkSpam: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam or try again.

contactPage.heroTitle: We'd Love to Hear From You
contactPage.heroDescription: Have questions about our platform? Want to schedule a demo? Our team is here to help.
contactPage.contactOptionsDescription: Reach out to us via your preferred method
contactPage.callUsDescription: Speak directly with our support team
contactPage.emailUsDescription: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours
contactPage.messageSentDescription: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

setPassword.setPasswordDescription: Enhance your account security by setting a password
setPassword.passwordErrorLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

profilePage.accountDescription: Manage your account settings and preferences
profilePage.personalInfoDescription: Update your personal information and how others see you on the platform
profilePage.avatarInfo: Recommended: Square image, JPG or PNG
profilePage.phoneError: Please enter a different phone number than your current one.
profilePage.updateError: Failed to update profile. Please try again.

changePasswordPage.updatePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure
changePasswordPage.passwordError: Your new password doesn't meet all requirements

subscriptionPage.purchaseTokensDescription: Purchase tokens to use our AI-powered services

settingsLayout.manageSettings: Manage your account settings and preferences.

logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
logoutWarning: You will be logged out of your account. This action cannot be undone.
sendJobInvitationsToSelectedApplicants: Send job invitations to the selected applicants.
beenSentJobInvitation: has been sent a job invitation
failedToInviteApplicants: Failed to invite applicants to the job
